info.description: Get the balances for an accountId.
info.title: BG PSD2 ACCOUNT BALANCES API

get.description: Get all the balances for the accountId

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: ID of the request, unique to the call, as determined by the initiating party.

parameters.name: account-id
parameters.description:
This identification is denoting the addressed account. 
The account-id is retrieved by using a "Read Account List" call. 
The account-id is the "id" attribute of the account structure. 
Its value is constant at least throughout the lifecycle of a given consent.

parameters.name: Consent-ID
parameters.description: ID of the request, unique to the call, as determined by the initiating party.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Basde on this date the balances are returned.

parameters.name: Digest
parameters.description: Is contained if and only if the "Signature" element is contained in the header of the request.

parameters.name: Signature
parameters.description: A signature of the request by the TPP on application level. This might be mandated by ASPSP.

parameters.name: TPP-Signature-Certificate
parameters.description:
The certificate used for signing the request, in base64 encoding. 
Must be contained if a signature is contained.

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Port
parameters.description: The forwarded IP Port header field consists of the corresponding HTTP request IP Port field between PSU and TPP, if available.

parameters.name: PSU-Accept
parameters.description: The forwarded IP Accept header fields consist of the corresponding HTTP request Accept header fields between PSU and TPP, if available.

parameters.name: PSU-Accept-Charset
parameters.description: The forwarded IP Accept header fields consist of the corresponding HTTP request Accept header fields between PSU and TPP, if available.

parameters.name: PSU-Accept-Encoding
parameters.description: The forwarded IP Accept header fields consist of the corresponding HTTP request Accept header fields between PSU and TPP, if available.

parameters.name: PSU-Accept-Language
parameters.description: The forwarded IP Accept header fields consist of the corresponding HTTP request Accept header fields between PSU and TPP, if available.

parameters.name: PSU-User-Agent
parameters.description: The forwarded Agent header field of the HTTP request between PSU and TPP, if available.

parameters.name: PSU-Device-ID
parameters.description:
UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) for a device, which is used by the PSU, if available.
UUID identifies either a device or a device dependant application installation.
In case of an installation identification this ID need to be unaltered until removal from device.

parameters.name: PSU-Http-Method
parameters.description:
HTTP method used at the PSU ? TPP interface, if available.
Valid values are:
* GET
* POST
* PUT
* PATCH
* DELETE

parameters.name: PSU-Geo-Location
parameters.description: The forwarded Geo Location of the corresponding http request between PSU and TPP if available.

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: HTTP request IP Address field between PSU and TPP

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Is contained only, if an OAuth2 based authentication was performed in a pre-step or an OAuth2 based SCA was performed in the related consent authorisation
